title: Putin and Xi call for halt to NATO expansion, Kremlin says, in show of unity at Beijing Olympics
content:
1. Putin and Xi call for halt to NATO expansion, Kremlin says, in show of unity at Beijing Olympics  CNN
  2. Russia-Ukraine Crisis Live Updates: Putin and Xi Meet in China  The New York Times
  3. Xi meets Putin in show of solidarity as U.S. warns against helping Russia evade Ukraine-linked sanctions  The Washington Post
  4. Vladimir Putin and Xi Jinping Meet as Frenemies with Benefits  Bloomberg
  5. Xi and Putin denounce Nato expansion as Ukraine tensions rise  The Guardian

localize.title: プーチンと習近平がNATOの拡大停止を要請、クレムリン発表、北京五輪で結束を示す
克里姆林宫称普京和习近平呼吁停止北约扩张，在北京奥运会上展示团结精神
克里姆林宮稱普京和習近平呼籲停止北約擴張，在北京奧運會上展示團結精神
